title: Sherrie Shepherd Interview and more
itunes:title: Sherrie Shepherd Interview and more
description:
Thursday 7/19 - Today on the show we had comedian, actress, and former talk show host Sherri Shepherd stop by where she spoke about her new show "Trial and Error: Lady Killer", paying child support, and even losing her virginity, which seemed very skeptical. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that stole his dates car and uses it for another date and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
